name: part_003
file: tmp_【 #常闇トワ6周年記念LIVE 】ROCK Festa !!!【 3DLIVE 】 [pmWH-wAJYRE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Tokoyami Towa introduces the 6th Anniversary Live and announces that it is pre-recorded.
Performance of the song 'Kizuna no Kiseki' as part of the Guest Part.
Transition to the next guest segment featuring Hoshimachi Suisei.

subtitles.original: さてさて、続いては…
subtitles.english: Now then, next up...

subtitles.original: 常闇トワ6周年記念ライブ、でよろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Tokoyami Towa 6th Anniversary Live, please enjoy!

subtitles.original: 目指せトレンド入り！
subtitles.english: Aiming for trending!

subtitles.original: えー、そしてね、この後はいろんな告知もありますので、
subtitles.english: And then, there will be various announcements later,

subtitles.original: 最後まで見ていってくれればなと思います！
subtitles.english: so I hope you watch until the end!

subtitles.original: はい。えー、で今日なんですけれども、
subtitles.english: Yes. And about today,

subtitles.original: 1月3日となっておりまして、
subtitles.english: it's January 3rd,

subtitles.original: 世の中はお休みの日ということで、わたくしもお休みの日ということで、
subtitles.english: and since it's a holiday for the world, and a holiday for me too,

subtitles.original: 本日のこのライブは全編収録となっております。
subtitles.english: today's live is fully pre-recorded.

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いいたします。
subtitles.english: Thank you for your understanding.

subtitles.original: そして、この後はなんとゲストパート！
subtitles.english: And then, next is the guest part!

subtitles.original: いっぱい、いろんなゲストが出てくれるので、
subtitles.english: Many different guests will appear,

subtitles.original: 楽しんで見ていってくれればなと思います！
subtitles.english: so I hope you enjoy watching!

subtitles.original: では、
subtitles.english: Well then,

subtitles.original: ゲストパート、どうぞ！
subtitles.english: guest part, here we go!

subtitles.original:
絆ノ奇跡
作詞・作曲：Jean-Ken Johnny
subtitles.english:
Kizuna no Kiseki
Lyrics & Composition: Jean-Ken Johnny

subtitles.original: 闇夜を駆け抜けて どこへ向かう
subtitles.english: Rushing through the dark night, where are we headed?

subtitles.original: 月明かりだけがただ一筋の道標
subtitles.english: Only the moonlight is a single signpost

subtitles.original: 痛みも悲しみも拭いきれず
subtitles.english: Unable to wipe away the pain and sadness

subtitles.original: されどこの胸の炎は消させない
subtitles.english: Yet I won't let the fire in this chest go out

subtitles.original: 誰がために僕たちは この思いを貫いて
subtitles.english: For whom do we carry out these feelings?

subtitles.original: 闇を裂き陽の下で 光差す日まで
subtitles.english: Tearing through the darkness under the sun, until the day light shines

subtitles.original: 解き放たれた心に宿した火よ
subtitles.english: The fire harbored in the unleashed heart

subtitles.original: 舞い上げもっと今 夜明けの向こう側へ
subtitles.english: Fly up higher now, towards the other side of dawn

subtitles.original: 似ているこの世界 もう一度愛せるまで
subtitles.english: This similar world, until we can love it once more

subtitles.original: 命、果てたとも 繋いでゆくよ
subtitles.english: Even if life ends, we will keep connecting

subtitles.original: 絆が紡いで 生まれた奇跡を
subtitles.english: The miracle born from the ties woven together

subtitles.original: 喜怒哀楽 夢揺らめいてる現世
subtitles.english: Joy, anger, grief, and pleasure... the shimmering dreams of this world

subtitles.original: 互いの正義をまた繰り返し振りかざす
subtitles.english: Brandishing our respective justices over and over again

subtitles.original: 誰がために繋ぐ命
subtitles.english: For whose sake do we connect our lives?

subtitles.original: 交わり縺れる運命
subtitles.english: The intertwined and tangled destinies

subtitles.original: 蛇の道 数多の罪 全てなぎ払え
subtitles.english: The path of the serpent, many sins... sweep them all away

subtitles.original: 解き放て今 僕らが起こした火を
subtitles.english: Unleash now, the fire we have started

subtitles.original: 舞い上げ走れば 明日が変わるはず
subtitles.english: If we fly up and run, tomorrow should change

subtitles.original: 君といるこの世界 二度と離さずに
subtitles.english: In this world where I am with you, I'll never let go again

subtitles.original: 君とともにゆく 瞼を閉じても
subtitles.english: Going along with you, even if I close my eyes

subtitles.original: 思い出すあの日を 打ちのめされても
subtitles.english: I'll remember that day, even if I'm defeated

subtitles.original: 焦がれた未来を
subtitles.english: The future I yearned for

subtitles.original: いつの日か君に 捧げてみせよう
subtitles.english: I'll show you that I'll dedicate it to you someday

subtitles.original: 解き放たれた心に宿した火よ
subtitles.english: The fire harbored in the unleashed heart

subtitles.original: 舞い上げもっと今 夜明けの向こうへ
subtitles.english: Fly up higher now, towards the other side of dawn

subtitles.original: 解き放て今 僕らが起こした火を
subtitles.english: Unleash now, the fire we have started

subtitles.original: 舞い上げ走れば 明日が変わるはず
subtitles.english: If we fly up and run, tomorrow should change

subtitles.original: 君といたこの世界 もう一度愛せるまで
subtitles.english: This world where I was with you, until we can love it once more

subtitles.original: 命、果てたとも 繋げてゆくよ
subtitles.english: Even if life ends, we will keep connecting

subtitles.original: 絆が紡いで 生まれた奇跡を
subtitles.english: The miracle born from the ties woven together
